description:
Syd Blakovich, ranked 1st, is the bad ass of Ultimate
Surrender. At just 5'2, this powerhouse dominates
with fear and ability. This Hungarian born athlete
lives for destroying hot sexy girls on the mat, then
fucking them like a raw animal. If you face this
terror, prepare for the fucking of your life.
Devi Lynne is a former collegian wrestler and high
school stand out. Since coming to Ultimate surrender,
she has been given nothing but the toughest of
opponents. At only 102lbs, she has faced the biggest
and toughest we have to offer. Devi is relentless,
fearless, and has earned her nickname many times over.
This match contains two creatures of nature slamming into
each other repeatedly without quarter without
surrender.
title: Syd Blakovich "The Nightmare" (10-2)
